hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah reported the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) as saying:The nearest a servant come to his Lord is when he is prostrating himself, so make supplication often

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الدُّعَاءِ فِي الرُّكُوعِ وَالسُّجُودِ
chapter.eng-name: The Supplication During The Ruku' And Prostration
